plot: Women are put in charge of the city government for a day, and the mayor must go to the train station to greet an opera singer.
title: All Girl Revue
plot_es: Women are put in charge of the city government for a day, and the mayor must go to the train station to greet an opera singer.
plot_en: Women are put in charge of the city government for a day, and the mayor must go to the train station to greet an opera singer.
